title: Exploring Taiwan
description:
Annual Travel Magazine.

Designed two spreads for an annual travel magazine. Concept is focusing on Jiufen, a specific tourist attraction in the mountains of Keelang, Taiwan. Illustrations and photographs are personally made.

Process: Used a grid system, combined photography, illustration and typography in a coherent way for the reader to have a visually-fun experience while also communicating hierarchies of various information such as lodging information and common tourist areas.
